content: if you loved my other earwarmer patterns you will love this free pattern too it ll be part of a set matching beanies available already and a cowl so keep your eyes opened and check my site regularly for updates say hello to the **goldberry earwarmer** which is the matching pair of my other design the goldberry beanie you can buy the pattern from my ravelry store here https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/goldberry-beanie it s a fun and interesting pattern to use up some scrap aran/worsted yarn and it is easily adjustable to fit any size **diffculty ** advanced beginner/intermediate **us terms** used throughout i hope you will love this pattern as much as i loved creating it **happy crocheting ** *krisztina*
